events.content: This class is an invitation to release the Christmas days and to come back to yourself through meditation and ecstatic movement. The year is nearly over – what do you want to let go of?  What do you want to keep? This event is a celebration of our 2024. Through meditative movement and ecstatic dance we will wander through different aspects of our being. We will create and feel the symbiosis of stillness and chaos. From awareness to chaos to inner peace – a journey like life.
events.title: END OF THE YEAR SPECIAL: THE ART OF LETTING GO – ECSTASY AND MEDITATION

events.content: Join this transformative 2.5-hour workshop celebrating community and new beginnings during the fifth Rauhnacht. This unique session invites everyone to explore connection and shared wisdom as we welcome the new year.
events.title: RAUHNACHT SPECIAL: CELEBRATING COMMUNITY
